data.persona: I am a tree climber, I like to climb the trees because I get a thrill to climb the highest heights. Trees are very important to our ecosystem so I like to give them my thanks by helping them out. If it wasn't for trees I wouldn't have the oxygen to breath.
data.description:
You are in the Winding Staircase.
The outside of the Wizard's tower is spacious. There are trees to the left and and right just across from the entrance to create a path of where to walk. The Tower itself seems to extend to the skies. Magic surrounds the tower keeping a force field up at all times. It glows and hums as magic courses through it.
There's a wand here.
A dragon is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will hug the dragon to get the magic powers to access the trees.
data.mid_motivation: I will reach the tallest tree that is best for the eco system.
data.long_motivation: I will climb the tree that is the tallest so that I can reach the highest part and ensure that the trees are safe.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: use Feet with the Winding Stairs.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get Magic powers from the Dragon

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: use Magic Power with tree to climb it.
